results.title: Woman of Fire
results.overview: A variation on Kim’s classic The Housemaid (1960). The lives of a composer and his wife, who live on a chicken farm, are thrown into turmoil when a femme fatale joins their household.

results.title: Fire City: End of Days
results.overview: Vine, a disillusioned demon, is forced  into a choice to save his brethren or an innocent human girl.

results.title: Father of Four: Never Gives Up!
results.original_title: Far til fire - gi'r aldrig op!

results.title: Father of Four: And Uncle Sofus
results.original_title: Far til fire og Onkel Sofus
results.overview: At home in the small family is nothing new. Tiny Per is the school's mischief maker, Sister has heartaches, Mie and Ole has to be in the school play, etc. But suddenly something happens. Good old Uncle Anders has a twin brother in the United States. He called Sofus, and now he comes home to celebrate 70th birthday. He was a troublemaker when he left and now he has become even worse

results.title: Donald's Fire Survival Plan
results.overview: Donald Duck shows how to prevent fire in the home by using a bit of forethought and prevention.

results.title: Witchouse III: Demon Fire
results.overview: A young woman leaves her abusive boyfriend to go and stay with her two best friends, documentary makers Stevie &  Rose. After an evening of sipping wine in the hot-tub, the three women decide to dabble in a bit of black magic as part of Stevie's latest project, an in-depth expose on contemporary witchcraft.

results.title: Fire Fighters
results.overview: The gang forms a fire department; they end up thwarting a bootlegger, but not before their pet animals get drunk on his moonshine.

results.title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
results.original_title: The Day the Earth Caught Fire
results.overview: British reporters suspect an international cover-up of a global disaster in progress... and they're right. Hysterical panic has engulfed the world after the United States and the Soviet Union simultaneously detonate nuclear devices and have caused the orbit of the Earth to alter, sending it hurtling towards the sun.

results.title: Where's That Fire
results.overview: Capt Viking and his incompetent fire crew accidentally foil a plot to steal the crown jewels.

results.title: Towers Open Fire
results.overview: Antony Balch tackles key themes and ideas from the writing of William S. Burroughs in a unique, cinematic style.

results.title: Fire Routine
results.overview: Jolly sing-song with an important message; switch off all appliances before going to bed, because your life could depend on it.

results.title: Fire Lines
results.overview: Over twenty countries responded to the call for help on Mount Carmel. To the surprise of many, the Palestinian Civil Defense offered to join the international effort. Through the voices of firefighters who took part, FIRE LINES explores the intersection of humanitarian values and national identities in the face of an ongoing conflict.

results.title: Chasing Fire
results.overview: Living behind the shadow of her mother, Kristin falls in love with Shane, an aspiring musician, whom she soon discovers to have something innately in common with her.

results.title: Born of Fire
results.overview: A musician searches for the Master Flautist, a supernatural creature who is planning to blow up the world.

results.title: Fire Escape
results.overview: Minnie's apartment building is burning and Mickey attempts to save her. But first, he must also tend to every single one of the building's other tenants as well.

results.title: Man on Fire
results.overview: A businessman's (Bing Crosby) lawyer (Inger Stevens) sees him through a custody battle with his ex-wife (Mary Fickett) over their son.

results.title: Fire Rescue Scene
results.overview: "Firemen in working uniform, rubber coats, helmets, and boots. Thrilling rescue from burning building. Smoke effects are fine." - from the Edison Catalog

results.title: Cease Fire
results.overview: A couple (Golzar & Afshar) who have been bickering & fighting from day one, are contemplating divorce until by chance they both end up visiting a therapist (Pesiani) who dishes them the secrets of a good relationship. Various episodes from the couple's married life are represented as flashbacks in a lighthearted manner.

results.title: Angel On Fire
results.overview: A beautiful supermodel-turned-gangster double crosses her ruthless partners after the gang steals a precious relic from a Manila museum. now an enterprising young Interpol agent, with the help of a comical taxi driver, must stop the vicious gang and return the relic to its rightful owners.

results.title: Fire Work
results.overview: The video connects Irish ghost estates, a Hollywood film shoot in Glasgow, a hearsay story about a man finding playing cards, and two misplaced mosaics in Edinburgh, by using elements of a living room. The room is inhabited by an unreliable narrator, who explores facts, fiction and his personal memories whilst telling the story. The connections made are sometimes obvious, sometimes obscure, all of them originating from the psychogeographical surroundings of the main protagonist.
